name: Sarah Chen
headline: AI Researcher | Stanford CS | Tech Innovator
about: Computer science major focusing on artificial intelligence and ethical tech development. Loves coding, data science, and collaborating on impactful software solutions.
activity: President of Stanford AI Club, contributor to open-source ML libraries, volunteer coder for nonprofit education platforms.
experience: AI Research Intern at OpenAI, Software Engineering Intern at Google, Machine Learning Teaching Assistant at Stanford.

name: David Lee
headline: Entrepreneur | Harvard MBA | Strategy Expert
about: Business student passionate about startups, innovation, and strategic leadership. Aims to build companies that balance profit with social and environmental impact.
activity: Founder of campus startup incubator, speaker at Harvard Innovation Lab events, mentor for student entrepreneurs.
experience: Business Strategy Intern at BCG, Product Manager Intern at a fintech startup, Venture Fellow at Impact Capital.

name: Emily Rodriguez
headline: Psychology Major | Mental Health Advocate
about: Yale student advocating for mental health awareness. Interested in clinical psychology and community outreach. Volunteers at youth centers and health organizations.
activity: Organizer of Yale Mental Health Week, peer counselor at student wellness center, blogger on youth mental health topics.
experience: Research Assistant at Yale Psychology Lab, Intern at National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI), Group Therapy Facilitator.

name: Michael Brown
headline: MIT Engineer | Robotics & Innovation
about: Engineering student focused on robotics and automation. Enjoys building practical, scalable solutions to complex problems. Interned at top tech firms in R&D roles.
activity: Team lead in MIT Robotics Club, organizer of campus hardware hackathon, mentor for FIRST Robotics teams.
experience: R&D Intern at Boston Dynamics, Mechanical Design Intern at Tesla, Engineering Assistant for MIT Autonomous Vehicle Project.

name: Jessica Wilson
headline: Biologist | UCLA | Genetics Research
about: Biology student exploring genetics and biomedical innovation. Participates in lab research and science communication projects. Excited about advancements in health and medicine.
activity: Editor of UCLA Science Journal, STEM mentor at local high school, contributor to genomics podcast.
experience: Research Assistant at UCLA Genomics Lab, Intern at Genentech, Student Fellow at Biomedical Innovation Hub.

name: Kevin Garcia
headline: Economics Student | Policy & Finance
about: University of Chicago student focused on economic theory and global policy. Works on financial modeling and policy impact analysis through research groups.
activity: Writer for UChicago Economics Review, economics tutor, participant in World Bank policy simulation.
experience: Research Intern at Federal Reserve Bank, Policy Analyst Intern at Brookings Institution, Consultant for student-run economic think tank.

name: Sophia Chen
headline: Math Enthusiast | Princeton | Data Nerd
about: Princeton mathematics student interested in statistics, algorithms, and data-driven decision making. Loves problem-solving, teaching, and contributing to open-source projects.
activity: Math Club leader, organizer of university coding contests, open-source contributor on GitHub.
experience: Intern at NASA Data Analytics Team, Summer Researcher at Princeton Institute for Advanced Study, Math Tutor for undergraduates.

name: Sophia Carter
headline: IR Major | Global Policy | Diplomat
about: Georgetown student passionate about diplomacy and sustainable development. Experienced in Model UN, international law, and human rights advocacy through internships and fieldwork.
activity: Secretary-General of Georgetown MUN, writer for International Affairs Review, volunteer at refugee support NGO.
experience: Intern at United Nations HQ, Legal Fellow at International Human Rights Organization, Research Assistant in Global Policy Lab.
